register.name: AMAIR0
register.description: When using the Long-descriptor format translation tables for stage 1 translations, provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR0.

register.name: AMAIR1
register.description: When using the Long-descriptor format translation tables for stage 1 translations, provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR1.

register.name: CONTEXTIDR
register.description: Identifies the current Process Identifier and, when using the Short-descriptor translation table format, the Address Space Identifier.

register.name: DACR
register.description: Defines the access permission for each of the sixteen memory domains.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

register.name: HAMAIR0
register.gui_name: Hyp Auxiliary Memory Attribute Indirection Register 0
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory attribute encodings defined by HMAIR0. These IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED attributes can only provide additional qualifiers for the memory attribute encodings, and cannot change the memory attributes defined in HMAIR0.

register.name: HAMAIR1
register.gui_name: Hyp Auxiliary Memory Attribute Indirection Register 1
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory attribute encodings defined by HMAIR1. These IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED attributes can only provide additional qualifiers for the memory attribute encodings, and cannot change the memory attributes defined in HMAIR1.

register.name: HMAIR0
register.description: Along with HMAIR1, provides the memory attribute encodings corresponding to the possible AttrIndx values in a Long-descriptor format translation table entry for stage 1 translations for memory accesses from Hyp mode.

bitField.name: Attr3
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where:

register.name: NMRR
register.description: Provides additional mapping controls for memory regions that are mapped as Normal memory by their entry in the PRRR.

bitField.name: OR7
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR6
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR5
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR4
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR3
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR2
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR1
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: OR0
bitField.description: Outer Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: IR7
bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: IR3
bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: IR2
bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: IR1
bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: IR0
bitField.description: Inner Cacheable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal memory by the PRRR.TR<n> entry. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

register.name: PRRR
register.description: Controls the top level mapping of the TEX[0], C, and B memory region attributes.

bitField.name: NOS7
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS6
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS5
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS4
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS3
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS2
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS1
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NOS0
bitField.description: NOS<n> is the Outer Shareable property mapping for memory attributes n, if the region is mapped as Normal or Device memory that is Shareable. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: NS1
bitField.description: Mapping of S = 1 attribute for Normal memory.

bitField.name: NS0
bitField.description: Mapping of S = 0 attribute for Normal memory.

bitField.name: DS1
bitField.description: Mapping of S = 1 attribute for Device memory. This bit gives the mapped Shareability attribute for a region of memory that is mapped to Device memory and has the S bit set to 1. In ARMv8, all types of Device memory are Outer Shareable, and therefore this bit is RES1.

bitField.name: DS0
bitField.description: Mapping of S = 0 attribute for Device memory. This bit gives the mapped Shareability attribute for a region of memory that is mapped to Device memory and has the S bit set to 0. In ARMv8, all types of Device memory are Outer Shareable, and therefore this bit is RES1.

bitField.name: TR7
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR6
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR5
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR4
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR3
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR2
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR1
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

bitField.name: TR0
bitField.description: TR<n> is the primary TEX mapping for memory attributes n, and defines the mapped memory type for a region with attributes n. n is the value of the TEX[0], C, and B bits concatenated.

register.name: TTBCR
register.description: Determines which of the Translation Table Base Registers defined the base address for a translation table walk required for the stage 1 translation of a memory access from any mode other than Hyp mode. Also controls the translation table format and, when using the Long-descriptor translation table format, holds cacheability and shareability information.

bitField.name: EAE
bitField.description: Extended Address Enable.

register.name: TTBR0
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 0, and information about the memory it occupies. This is one of the translation tables for the stage 1 translation of memory accesses from modes other than Hyp mode.

bitField.name: TTB0
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[31:x], where x is 14-(TTBCR.N).

bitField.name: IRGN_0
bitField.description: See IRGN[1] below for description of the IRGN field.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: Not Outer Shareable bit. Indicates the Outer Shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk that has the Shareable attribute, indicated by TTBR0.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Region bits.

bitField.name: IMP
bitField.description: The effect of this bit is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. If the translation table implementation does not include any IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED features this bit is UNK/SBZP.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shareable bit.

bitField.name: IRGN_1
bitField.description: Inner region bits. Indicates the Inner Cacheability attributes for the memory associated with the translation table walks.

register.name: TTBR0_64
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 0, and information about the memory it occupies. This is one of the translation tables for the stage 1 translation of memory accesses from modes other than Hyp mode.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TTBCR.A1 field selects either TTBR0.ASID or TTBR1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[47:x], Bits [x-1:0] are RES0, with the additional requirement that if bits[x-1:3] are not all zero, this is a misaligned Translation Table Base Address, with effects that are CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE, and must be one of the following:

register.name: TTBR1
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 1, and information about the memory it occupies. This is one of the translation tables for the stage 1 translation of memory accesses from modes other than Hyp mode.

bitField.name: TTB1
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[31:14].

bitField.name: IRGN_0
bitField.description: See IRGN[1] below for description of the IRGN field.

bitField.name: NOS
bitField.description: Not Outer Shareable bit. Indicates the Outer Shareable attribute for the memory associated with a translation table walk that has the Shareable attribute, indicated by TTBR0.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Region bits.

bitField.name: IMP
bitField.description: The effect of this bit is IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED. If the translation table implementation does not include any IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED features this bit is UNK/SBZP.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shareable bit.

bitField.name: IRGN_1
bitField.description: Inner region bits. Indicates the Inner Cacheability attributes for the memory associated with the translation table walks.

register.name: TTBR1_64
register.description: Holds the base address of translation table 1, and information about the memory it occupies. This is one of the translation tables for the stage 1 translation of memory accesses from modes other than Hyp mode.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TTBCR.A1 field selects either TTBR0.ASID or TTBR1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[47:x], Bits [x-1:0] are RES0, with the additional requirement that if bits[x-1:3] are not all zero, this is a misaligned Translation Table Base Address, with effects that are CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE, and must be one of the following:

tcf:enumItem.description: No access. Any access to the domain generates a Domain fault.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_access

tcf:enumItem.description: Client. Accesses are checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.
tcf:enumItem.name: Client

tcf:enumItem.description: Manager. Accesses are not checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.
tcf:enumItem.name: Manager

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Use the VMSAv8-32 translation system with the Short-descriptor translation table format.
tcf:enumItem.name: Use_the_VMSAv8_32_translation_system_with_the_Short_descriptor_translation_table_format

tcf:enumItem.description: Use the VMSAv8-32 translation system with the Long-descriptor translation table format.
tcf:enumItem.name: Use_the_VMSAv8_32_translation_system_with_the_Long_descriptor_translation_table_format

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back no Write-Allocate Cacheable.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_no_Write_Allocate_Cacheable
